function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex social systems leading to lower stability and restrictions on public health measures","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled disease spread and reduced effectiveness of public health measures","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted public health interventions, improving access to healthcare, and promoting community engagement","Technologies":"Digital tools for disease prediction, telemedicine, and AI for drug discovery","People":"Public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"5G technology as a disruptive innovation","Impact":"Potential increased exposure to electromagnetic fields, privacy and security concerns, and reliance on interconnected IoT devices","Mitigation":"Implementing robust privacy and security protocols, conducting thorough health and environmental impact studies, and regulating IoT device standards","Technologies":"5G, IoT, BDA (big data analytics), cloud, SDN","People":"General public, tech industry, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, tech companies, healthcare institutions"}]}
